title: Quicksand (1950, Crime) Mickey Rooney, Jeanne Cagney, Peter Lorre | Movie

sources.title: Quicksand (1950, Crime) Mickey Rooney, Jeanne Cagney, Peter Lorre | Movie
sources.description:
The shadows of crime, where choices sink deep and desperation fuels an obscure odyssey.
A borrowed $20 sparks a perilous descent for Mickey Rooney's auto mechanic character. Blackmail, betrayal, and a desperate bid for freedom lead him through the shadows of noir, where each choice pulls him deeper into the criminal abyss.

Origin title: Quicksand (1950)

Colorized version https://youtu.be/AbIchqFrizU


This film is subtitled in many language options.

Director: Irving Pichel
Writer: Robert Smith 
Stars: Mickey Rooney, Jeanne Cagney, Barbara Bates & Peter Lorre
Genre: Classics, Cult Film, Drama, Crime, Mystery, Film Noir, Romance


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:34 A group of friends discuss fishing plans, relationships, and financial struggles in a waterfront setting.
15:32 Escaping difficult pasts, two individuals bond over shared experiences and stargazing, reflecting on their troubled backgrounds.
21:16 A man buys a watch on credit and pawns it, facing consequences from a detective for theft.
23:52 Shorty faces financial troubles and visits Phil's Place for drinks, where he contemplates his debts and gets involved in a confrontation.
32:14 Danny gets involved in a shady business deal regarding a stolen car and a mysterious green sedan.
40:53 A man gets involved in a crime and must come up with $3000 to avoid trouble, leading to a risky heist.
49:49 A man discovers a large sum of money and faces consequences in a crime-filled plot.
58:15 A woman is caught up in a crime involving stolen money, a murdered man, and a deceptive boyfriend.
1:03:58 A man confesses to murder and plans to flee to Mexico with the help of a woman, resorting to kidnapping a lawyer for assistance.
1:08:49 A man recounts a crime story to a detective, leading to a plan to escape before the police arrive.
1:13:38 A crime unfolds as authorities investigate shootings and a suspect is pursued.
